now.title: Hello, I'm Sebastian
now.intro: I currently am a National Serviceman (NSF) based in Singapore. I love to learn and try cool things.
now.past: I've previously worked on small projects to give back to the community.
now.hobbies: I'm trying to pick back up reading as a hobby. I also enjoy playing video games with friends!

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subtitle: Here are some of the things I've done!

content.title: Consultant Developer
descriptionPoints: Developed a web application (Next.js, Nest.js, Turborepo), to help the organisation manage internal data.
Cut down long-term cloud costs by 200%.
Volunteered on the ground weekly to solve personal issues of local tissue paper sellers.

content.title: Student
descriptionPoints: Graduated with an GCE A Level Certificate: H2 Computing, H2 Economics, H2 Mathematics, H2 Physics, H1 General Paper, H1 Project Work.
Active participant in the school's Interact Club: volunteered at the National Kidney Foundation, mentored primary school students, and participated in advocacy events.
Built OneInteract, a web application (Next.js + Express) to manage attendance, with club-wide adoption.
Participated in hackathons and CTFs: 1st Place, BuildingBlocs Sept 2023 | 5th Place, Whitehacks 2024.

content.title: Developer
descriptionPoints: Contributed to the Holy Grail project, a web application (Vite + FastAPI) for crowdsourced Singapore exam materials.
Merged 20+ pull requests and built many new features: user settings, file multi-upload, and UI improvements.
As of present, this website serves 2000+ active users and 14000 requests per day.

content.title: Student
descriptionPoints: Graduated with a GCE O Level Certificate: English Language, Combined Humanities (Geography/SS), Mathematics, Additional Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Higher Chinese, Malay (Special Programme).
